Very helpful: 

FS Hangar Extender

Hyperedit
The blue dish ain't all that for good looks. Nice work, you surpassed the part count of my Y-Wing, have the official "Computer fryer" award. (It's rep.)

That's no moon... It's a space station!

JR

Wow, impressive! I'm trying to figure out a way to put this in orbit without Hyperedit XD 

BTW, what mod u used for that bluish Kerbin?

Almost 6 million kilogram, 132 meter long ... You'd probably need a launcher the size of the KSC ;-)

In reality they'd build something like this in space or on Minmus.

The mod that gives Kerbin it's colour is called Scatterer.

My god that is insane.

Question though: Have you actually attempted to dock something to that beastly thing?
You know what ... I'll hyperedit the parts reduced version into orbit, and then launch one of my interplanetary trucks to dock inside it.
